message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $11000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $10000 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10000. I'm willing to go up to $11200, which is still a great deal for you considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $10800 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to go up to $11000, but no higher.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $10900 for it.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11100, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the end of the road. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $11000 for it.
